channel.title: Czar/Delta Death
channel.description:
Hey,
I got this new czar server im working on. Last server i had was a delta and when someone died on it and returned in a set of time you could get it back.
On the czar u can see it once everybody else can see it.
what can i do to make it on the czar?
I have looked on every death realeted thing in teh delta but cant find anything.
Someone mind helping me out?
thanks

item.description:
@TormentedSoul wrote:

You need a set-timer basically like a tombstone which will last for 4:00 minutes. Iâ€™m sure if you googled that you would find something.
